value.title: Face Time With Eight Mayoral Candidates
value.excerpt: This year, the candidates have spent a lot of their time on Zoom. It’s been weird. But the internet — in this case, Skype — is how I last talked with Kathryn Garcia, a wry, thoughtful former sanitation commissioner and candidate for mayor who deserves more attention than she has so far received in the race.

value.title: Facebook enhances AI computer vision with SEER
value.excerpt: At a time when many versions of AI rely on pre-established data sets for image recognition, Facebook has developed SEER (Self-supERvised) – a deep learning solution able to register images on the Internet independent of curated and labeled data sets.
